content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Storage at position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -80.5) transferring items between the chests

#### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at position (52.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (52.0, -79.0)
- Burner inserter at position (53.5, -79.5) transferring items to the furnace
- Wooden chest at position (54.5, -79.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at position (55.5, -78.5) transferring items from the chest

#### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -48.5) transferring items from the drill to the chest
- Burner inserter at position (-12.5, -48.5) transferring items between inserters

#### Resource Storage at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (0.5, 0.5) containing various resources
- Wooden chest at position (1.5, 0.5) containing various resources
- Wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) containing coal
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5) containing coal
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, 0.5) containing coal and iron ore
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5) containing iron ore, iron plates, and iron gear wheels

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is free before placing an entity to avoid placement errors.

#### Errors when entities run out of fuel
- Regularly check and refuel entities like burner mining drills and furnaces to maintain continuous operation.

#### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Ensure that inserters have a steady supply of items to transfer to avoid delays in production.

#### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly empty chests that are at full capacity to allow continued operation of connected entities like mining drills.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- None defined yet.

#### Important Variables
- None assigned yet.
